meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a NIMBY.
meanings.sent1: Her nimbynesses were evident when she protested against the new construction in her neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The nimbynesses of the residents led to the rejection of the proposed landfill site.
meanings.sent3: Despite his nimbynesses, he couldn't resist the convenience of the new shopping center.
meanings.sent4: The nimbynesses in the community were like a thick fog, obscuring any progress.
meanings.sent5: The nimbynesses of the group were as stubborn as a mule, refusing to consider any compromise.

meanings.definition: The attitudes or behaviors associated with NIMBYism.
meanings.sent1: The nimbynesses of the local council delayed the construction of the affordable housing project.
meanings.sent2: Her nimbynesses were evident in her opposition to the wind turbine installation.
meanings.sent3: The nimbynesses of the group turned a simple zoning meeting into a heated debate.
meanings.sent4: The nimbynesses in the neighborhood were like a barrier preventing any change.
meanings.sent5: The nimbynesses of the committee members were as loud as a thunderstorm, drowning out any other opinions.
